name: Mada Koi Towa Shirazu ni
nutshell: Set during the Keiou era of Japan. In the restlessness before the storm of revolution, the heir of a wealthy samurai family meets a beautiful young man.

name: Tao Tie Jie
nutshell: Demon brothers Tao Tie and Kui Long arrive at a village to prepare to receive a ritual sacrifice that happens every 10 years. Kui Long introduces himself as Wu Chen to a girl named Tan Hua. Turns out Tan Hua actually died from an illness beforehand but her brother the doctor gave her a medicine that revived her so that she would be the sacrifice and not him. Neither Kui Long nor Tan Hua know of each others role in the approaching ritual…

name: A Manga Where Rapper Bites Turn You Into A Rapper
nutshell: The rise of rappers due to a mysterious virus! Japan has turned into a hellish clubhouse! Holy shit! The rappers are gonna eat you!

name: Natsu no Arashi!
nutshell: In an old town coffee shop, a boy met an older high school girl. From there… an unforgettable summer began.

name: Collabo Dragon (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
The 'Collabo Dragon' series by DragonGarowLEE is a 1200+ page battle doujinshi that combines both Dragon Ball and Dragon Quest.
The basic premise is that a post-GT Piccolo is fighting in Hell against a combination of enemies from both series.
Note: Only LQ scans available from the artist.

name: Anata no Jinsei Hikiukemasu!
nutshell: An elite businessman exerting himself at a publishing company is demoted to the manga editorial department, which is out of his field of experience. Moreover, his first charge is a comic artist that no one can handle…

name: Kimi no Tame nara Shineru
nutshell: The 27-year-old Shonagon, depicted here as a sort of medieval NEET, manages to land a job as the private tutor of a beautiful and refined 13-year-old, Princess Teishi. There are also a number of other quirky court ladies, some of whom have their eyes on Shonagon.

name: Hantsu x Trash——Colourful collection of short sexy stories
nutshell:
《青春水球社》是由日本漫画家小林雏作画的漫画。主要讲述了滨路好不容易考上高中，但是每天却都无所事事，对什么都不感兴趣只幻想着跟女孩子亲热。
某天2年级学长中岛突然邀请他加入社团，还夸口说社团里的女孩子都随他摸任他揉，这番话让滨路完全无法招架而决定加入，结果才发现是“水球社” 。第一天前往社团，他所展现的过人弹跳能力就让2年级的萩原学姊相当惊讶，她的鼓励让原本有些失望的滨路打算试试看。

name: Egoism
nutshell:
After his father remarries, Jaeun must now live under the same roof with his new stepbrother Jihan. However, life isn't easy when their abusive Alpha father is hellbent on controlling their lives. Things only get worse when Jaeun is revealed to be an Omega. Abandoned by his family and friends, Jaeun realizes he only has Jihan to depend on. Now as adults and living together, will this bond withstand the heat of an Omega?
This comic contains depictions of domestic abuse. Reader discretion is advised.



Original Webtoon <Bomtoon>


Original Webtoon <OneStory>


Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>


Original Webtoon <kakao>


Original Webtoon <Naver>





Official German Translation


Official French Translation

name: Suki na Hito no Suki na Hito
nutshell: The top most popular boy and girl in the grade: Hashida-kun and Kaneishi-san. No one knows if they are dating but, they look good together and rumours never cease to follow them. Chiyo recklessly harbours an unrequited love for this Hashida. She becomes acquainted with Hashida as their seats are next to each other and she also discovers that Hashida harbours an unrequited love for Kaneishi. However, Kaneishi also harbours an unrequited love for someone else――

name: Detective Lady
nutshell: Huang Zixia is an investigative prodigy who proved herself by helping her father solve confounding crimes. After being accused of murdering her whole family due to an arranged marriage, the heroine is on the run. When she meets a prince, they work together to investigate the truth of the murder. However, things aren't as simple as they seem when she discovers she isn't the only one with a secret.

name: Nibanme ja Dame Nan Desu Ka
Fate/Grand Order -turas réalta-
nutshell:
"The human race will become extinct in 2017." The Chaldea organization, an organization charged with preserving the future of humanity, observes a singularity. To solve it, Rika Fujimaru and Mash Kyrielight will be transported to the city of Fuyuki in 2004. The battle for the future of humanity has begun.

Note: This manga adapts the first, third, fifth, seventh and final singularity from Part 1 of Fate/Grand Order.

name: Koi wa Itsumo Tabekake
nutshell:
A compilation of one-shots:


Love is Always Half-Eaten (Koi wa Itsumo Tabekake)
Girls who don't treat other girls well are pitiful indeed. Also, they're not considered charming at all. Sometimes they tend to show their kindness in a wrong way. You won't be able to catch anything unless your bait isn't tasty. You have to scatter it well…


Forgotten Things in August
Red candyapple. Fireworks, a broken sandal strap. Since then …


Because of Shiozaki-kun's Touch


Our Moment…


Winter, Spring, Summer, Autumn

name: Shingeki no Kyojin - The Sea, Clear Skies, and Two Guys (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing : Erwin x Levi

name: Kirei na Onee-san to Nomu Osake wa Suki desu ka?
nutshell: By chance, ordinary salaryman Hiyoshi ends up becoming a drinking buddy to his admired senpai from work, Tsukizawa-san. However, all the drinkeries that Tsukizawa-san brings him to are weird places…!? An adult love comedy featuring drinking spots that exist in real life!

name: Cube x Cursed x Curious
nutshell:
Yachi Haruaki is a high school boy. He is naturally resistant to curse and his father Honatsu sends him cursed instruments called "Worse" to let him break the curse. One day, Haruaki receives a black cube from Honatsu. At the night, he encounters a naked silver haired girl stealing rice crackers. She is the human-form of the black cube, an instrument of torture called "Fear in Cube". Haruaki and the girl 'Fear' fight together against other 'Worse' instruments and their owners using Fear's 32 mechanisms of torture.
See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.
Wikipedia

name: Busshi no Busshin - Kamakura Hanbun Busshiroku
nutshell:
Once upon a time, in the Kamakura period...
A boy Buddhist image maker, Sou, lost half of his body in the golden land of Hiraizumi.
Sou, now half-human and half-Buddha, is destined to a hapless fate?!
Kamatani Yuhki of Nabari no Ou takes on the challenge of creating spectacular picture scrolls filled with Buddhist images!

name: Gundam Reconguista in G
nutshell: Set in the Regild Century, the era set after the Universal Century, follow the adventures of a pilot trainee named Bellri Zenam in the Capital Guard, an organization protecting a space elevator.

name: Tenshi no Tamago
nutshell:
This is a tempestuous and heartbreaking love story about Ayuta, a rounin who aspires to attend an art university, who, in a jam-packed train, falls in love with Haruhi, a psychiatrist eight years his senior.
Tenshi no Tamago is the manga adaptation of the Naoki Award-winning Murayama Yuka's novel of the same title.

name: The Crossdressing Boy Who Wanted to Try Attending Class in a Sailor Uniform
Mortal Metal Shibagane
nutshell:
The weapons of the future, Metal Vessels, are being developed by different companies. One company, Sigma, has created a vessel that is controlled by two people– a telepath and an anti-telepath. These two people are the teenage girl telepath, Yuiri, and her friend Io, an anti-telepath. They use their vessel mostly in demonstrations, such as competitive exhibitions with rival company Ciel's newest model.
While these vessels may seem to be the way of the future, the technology can also be very dangerous. A serial murderer is on the loose, who chooses targets through a website, and the police are beginning to suspect that the killer is actually using a Metal Vessel…

name: The hero, the priestess, and the strongest armor
nutshell: But is it rustproof?

name: Rental Magica from SOLOMON
nutshell:
Due to his father's disappearance, Itsuki Iba at a young age has to take over the family business: Astral Rental Magica, a magician dispatch service. A Rental Magica company employs magicians and other supernatural beings in order to hire them out to those who need magical assistance.
Inheriting the leadership position of Astral, Itsuki now has to be tough, commanding, and reliable, but there's one problem: he's a coward. His personality also doesn't help him connect with his employees or face those who threaten the family business–and some of the latter are supernaturally powerful and quite dangerous.
Wikipedia

name: Suspicious Secret Counseling Unit
nutshell: Taehee is bothered by Haewon's, from the same class, constant gaze. Looking for the reason why Haewon is staring at him…and yet why is Haewon with a boy in the alley?! Haewon's words to Taehee, who was struck by shock and confusion, "Hey, there's a ghost behind you." The ghost involved, Han Taehee! The one who sees ghost, Kim Haewon! The one who catches ghosts, Choi Minho! The one that is like a ghost, Kim Chan! The occult and young youth drama of four people with strong personalities!

name: Hibusou Shinki
nutshell: Official promotional manga for the Busou Shinki figure line drawn by Karashiichi. Focuses on the daily events surrounding the staff of a Shinki store and their Shinkis.

name: 808 Machi Hyori - Keshoshi
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
The cosmetics sold by the apothecary Shikitei Shoho are very popular among Edo women, from the landlady of a large store to townswomen. The young master, Shikitei Kosanma, is the most skilled cosmetologist in Edo. Not only does he use makeup to beautify and adorn women, but he also glamorously and flashily arranges the front and back sides of Edo culture! But what a novel technique that could be used in today's advertising industry! This is an Oedo business jidaigeki full of Ishinomori Shotaro's style, serialized in "Big Comic" from 1983 to 1984!

name: Josou Kareshi to Dansou Kanojo
nutshell: Love comedy manga of their crossdressings
